dct_title_s: An exact prospect of Charlestown, the metropolis of the province of South Carolina
dct_description_sm: This print of an engraving was included in the Year Book--1882, City of Charleston, S.C. The engraving originally appeared in the London Magazine, June, 1762.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.

Shows a view of Charleston, South Carolina, noting the (A) Granville Bastion, (B) Court House, (C) Council Chamber, (D) Meeting House, (E) St. Phillip's, (F) Custom House, (G) Secretary's Office, (H) Craven's Bastion.
